name: The Gunslinger's Apprentice & the Salesman
description:
CW: Music autoplay

A western take on the tale of the Master & Pupil for the Twine Games Jam. 

When the Salesman comes into town not long after the Gunslinger leaves, the Gunslinger's Apprentice decides that this is the prime opportunity to get the experience he needs.

However, the Salesman isn't all he seems, and he sure isn't willing to pay the Gunslinger a living wage.
